medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a one-day history of abdominal pain that began as diffuse pain last night. This morning, the pain localized primarily to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and was accompanied by nausea and several episodes of nonbloody vomiting (6+) and nonbloody diarrhea (5+ episodes). Pressing on the RLQ worsens the pain. Pain improved with medication but he cannot find a comfortable position. Mild dysuria developed within the last hour. The patient's last meal was at 10:30 AM.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
